info.name: Twitch Chat Darkest_Mage BetterTTV
info.description: This stylesheet takes BetterTTV into account when styling the Twitch.TV chat.
info.additionalInfo:
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/40409/Magic/%7E%7ETwitchChatMJ4.png

All being done using Stylish and BetterTTV with BetterTTV settings "Darken Twitch" enabled and "Black Chat (Chroma Key)" disabled.

Updated to v1.01 2014-01-06 --
* Fix to mod icons.
* Hide ".fromjtv" messages by default. This includes ban and timeout messages.

Updated to v1 2014-01-02 --
* Fixed to accomodate several Twitch.TV & BetterTTV improvements and changes.

Updated to v0.062 2013-08-05 10:35pm cdt --
* Made the borders (gray lines) between chat lines more consistently controllable from the CSS.

Updated to v0.1 2013-12-30 --
* Fixed several icon issues related to BetterTTV improvements and Twitch stylesheet changes.

Updated to v0.061 2013-08-05 --
* Forced all usernames to lowercase to avoid problem with capitals showing up slightly after the text is added to the line.
* Removed system messages from the view (ban/timeout).
* More tweaking on indent/spacing.
* Added more comments to the CSS.
* Fixed long non-broken text from failing to word-wrap correctly in some cases.
